ai.summary: A tiny, easy nature walk in the Guildford area of the United Kingdom. At only 0.2 km, itâ€™s a quick, family-friendly outing that offers a brief connection with local greenery.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat terrain with a mix of paved and compact dirt surfaces. Very gentle elevation change; suitable for walkers, strollers, and casual outings.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on designated paths and be mindful of other trail users. Check the weather before you go; wear sturdy footwear and bring a light layer. Keep pets on a short leash where required and watch for uneven surfaces after rain.
ai.best_seasons: All year round; spring and early autumn can be particularly pleasant.
